medical_history.chief_complaint: Swelling and pain in the right leg.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was diagnosed with Klippel-Trenaunay-Weber Syndrome (KTWS) with arteriovenous fistula in the right leg 10 years prior. In the past year, the patient's abdominal aorta enlarged to a size indicated for surgery, and he has experienced continuous pain in the abdominal region.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient had undergone an open total gastrectomy for gastric cancer three years previously and has a history of abdominal surgery.
